Translations.Text: Successful! Indeed must be the believers
Those who make themselves humble in their prayer
And those who avoid useless talk
And those who are give (the due) charity
And those who guard their chastity, (And their private parts from immoral acts of sex)
Except with those united to them by the bond of marriage, or (those) whom their right hands possess— For them, they are free from blame
But those whose desires are beyond such limits— (They) are the transgressors—
Those who truly keep their trusts and their promises
And who (strictly ensure and) guard their prayers—
These are indeed, the heirs
Who will inherit the Paradise: They will live in there forever
And indeed, We created man from purest (of the clay)
Then We placed him like (a drop of) semen firmly fixed, in a place of (its) rest

Then We made the semen into a mass of half-solidified blood; Then from that mass We made an (early embryonic baby-like) lump: Then We made from the lump bones and covered the bones with flesh; Then We developed from it another creature, so blessed be Allah, the Best to create
After that, at length, surely you will die
Then again, surely, on the Day of Judgment, you will be raised up
And above you, We have made seven heavens; And We are never unmindful of (Our) Creation
And We send down water from the sky in (proper) quantity, and We make it sink (deep) in the soil; And truly We are able to drain it off
Then with it (the water) We grow gardens of date—palms and vines for you; In them you have plenty of fruits; And from them you eat (and you rejoice)—
And also a tree that grows from Mount Sinai, which produces oil and relish for those who use it for food

And truly, (also) in cattle you have an example to learn from: From inside their bodies We produce (milk) for you to drink: (In addition), from them there are many (other) benefits for you: And you eat from their (meat)
And on them, as in ships, you ride
